_aChangeLog.text: Changed double door to sliding in main cell area
Changed texture in prisoner loading area
Added more speakers in football for louder sound effects
Only one cell vent is active per round
Games have timer to let people know when its ready

_sText:
Designed and mapped by StyleZ.
==================

Notes
------------------
5 beta versions have come to this. The final version of jb italia.

Map features
------------------
- Random gun cells
- Different guns spawned every round
- 1 vent cell
- 1 random teleport in cell
- 1 secret teleport to skybox then to armoury

Activities
------------------
- Dodge the Italian flag game
- Dodge the barrel game
- 3 rooms of death
- Bunny hop
- Jump game
- 4 corners
- Table game
- Theatre
- Trampoline
- Football pitch
- Club (5 songs)

Final Change log
------------------
- Only one cell vent is active per round
- Guns around map degraded
- Song changed in disco
- Games have timer to let people know when its ready
- Slight visual changes

Credits
------------------

### Disco songs

- Video Games - Lana Del Rey
- Wildfire - SBTRKT
- Paris - Jay-Z & Kanye West
- Cult of Personality - Living Colour
- Combination Pizza Hut and Taco Bell - Das Racist
